verses.name: Numbers 29:31
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:32
verses.text: And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:33
verses.text: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:34
verses.text: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:35
verses.text: On the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: ye shall do no servile work therein:
